name: resolveTargetNote(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the note that receives the new content.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveTargetNote(for intent: INAppendToNoteIntent, 
                           with completion: @escaping (INNoteResolutionResult) -> Void)
